title: Best Crypto to invest in before the bull cycle properly begins? A coin at $0.035 could hit $2 faster than you think
description: The crypto market is entering a phase of anticipation. Bitcoin has been consolidating after its latest rally, and that usually sets the stage for altcoins to run even harder once momentum picks up. Experienced traders who have been following crypto charts know that the next wave of gains often starts with those who accumulate strong […]
